name: Proxy - Ultimate Hacker
description: Out there is a world of corporate corruption and government lies. You are a lone hacker armed with a terminal and a personal proxy. Break in. Cause damage. Get paid.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 170 MB available space
